accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Needed for pool seeds derivation / will be stored inside pool

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the NFT.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist that gatekeeps which NFTs can be deposited into the pool.

accounts.name: ownerAta
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred from.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT will be escrowed.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT. It should be the mint account common
to the owner_ata and pool_ata.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT receipt account denoting that an NFT has been deposited into a pool.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: ownerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata owner/buyer token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata pool token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: authRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Fee destination account

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and will receive the NFT at the owner_ata account.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool from which the NFT will be withdrawn.

accounts.name: ownerAta
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this action.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT token is escrowed.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata pool temporary token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: authRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and will receive the SOL.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool from which the SOL will be withdrawn.

accounts.name: owner
docs: Owner is the pool owner who created the pool and the nominal owner of the
Owner is the pool owner who created the pool and the nominal owner of the
escrowed NFT. In this transaction they are the seller, though the transfer
of the NFT is handled by the pool.

accounts.name: buyer
docs: Buyer is the external signer who sends SOL to the pool to purchase the escrowed NFT.

accounts.name: buyerAta
docs: The ATA of the buyer, where the NFT will be transferred.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT is held.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT. It should be the mint account common
to the owner_ata, pool_ata and the mint stored in the nft receipt.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: nftReceipt
docs: The NFT deposit receipt account, which tracks an NFT to the pool it was deposited to.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the pool.

accounts.name: buyerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata token record for the buyer.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: authRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that pool liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The taker broker account that receives the taker fees.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the buyer/recipient of the NFT.

accounts.name: seller
docs: The seller is the owner of the NFT who is selling the NFT into the pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The Pool state account that the NFT is being sold into. Stores pool state and config,
but is also the owner of any NFTs in the pool, and also escrows any SOL.
Any pool can be specified provided it is a Token type and the NFT passes at least one
whitelist condition.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist account that the pool uses to verify the NFTs being sold into it.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: sellerAta
docs: The token account of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: ownerAta
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT token is temporarily escrowed as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT being sold.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenProgram
docs: Either the legacy token program or token-2022.

accounts.name: associatedTokenProgram
docs: The SPL associated token program.

accounts.name: systemProgram
docs: The SPL system program.

accounts.name: edition
docs: The Token Metadata edition account of the NFT.

accounts.name: ownerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata owner/buyer token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: sellerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata seller/source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata pool temporary token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: authRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that pool liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The taker broker account that receives the taker fees.

accounts.name: cosigner
docs: The optional cosigner account that must be passed in if the pool has a cosigner.
Checks are performed in the handler.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and the buyer/recipient of the NFT.

accounts.name: seller
docs: The seller is the owner of the NFT who is selling the NFT into the pool.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The Pool state account that the NFT is being sold into. Stores pool state and config,
but is also the owner of any NFTs in the pool, and also escrows any SOL.
Any pool can be specified provided it is a Trade type and the NFT passes at least one
whitelist condition.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: The whitelist account that the pool uses to verify the NFTs being sold into it.

accounts.name: mintProof
docs: Optional account which must be passed in if the NFT must be verified against a
merkle proof condition in the whitelist.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT being sold.

accounts.name: sellerAta
docs: The token account of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: The Token Metadata metadata account of the NFT.

accounts.name: sellerTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata seller/source token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: poolTokenRecord
docs: The Token Metadata pool temporary token record account of the NFT.

accounts.name: tokenMetadataProgram
docs: The Token Metadata program account.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The sysvar instructions account.

accounts.name: authorizationRulesProgram
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules program account.

accounts.name: authRules
docs: The Metaplex Token Authority Rules account that stores royalty enforcement rules.

accounts.name: sharedEscrow
docs: The shared escrow account for pools that pool liquidity in a shared account.

accounts.name: takerBroker
docs: The taker broker account that receives the taker fees.

accounts.name: cosigner
docs: The optional cosigner account that must be passed in if the pool has a cosigner.
Checks are performed in the handler.

accounts.name: owner
docs: The owner of the pool and will receive the SOL.

accounts.name: pool
docs: The pool from which the SOL will be withdrawn.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: If no external rent payer, this should be the buyer.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Needed for pool seeds derivation, has_one = whitelist on pool

accounts.name: buyerAta
docs: The ATA of the buyer, where the NFT will be transferred.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT will be escrowed.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: If no external rent payer, set this to the owner.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Needed for pool seeds derivation, also checked via has_one on pool

accounts.name: ownerAta
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred from.

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT will be escrowed.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: If no external rent_payer, this should be set to the seller.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Needed for pool seeds derivation, also checked via has_one on pool

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT being sold.

accounts.name: sellerAta
docs: The ATA of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: ownerAta
docs: The ATA of the owner, where the NFT will be transferred to as a result of this sale.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: If no external rent_payer, this should be set to the seller.

accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Needed for pool seeds derivation, also checked via has_one on pool

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint account of the NFT being sold.

accounts.name: sellerAta
docs: The ATA of the NFT for the seller's wallet.

accounts.name: rentPayer
docs: If no external rent_payer, this should be set to the owner.

accounts.name: owner
docs: Tied to the pool because used to verify pool seeds

accounts.name: poolAta
docs: The ATA of the pool, where the NFT token is escrowed.

accounts.name: NftDepositReceipt
docs: Represents NFTs deposited into a Trade or NFT pool.
Seeds: "nft_receipt", mint, pool

fields.name: version
docs: Pool version, used to control upgrades.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the pool PDA.

fields.name: poolId
docs: Owner-chosen identifier for the pool

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the pool creation, in seconds.

fields.name: updatedAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the last time the pool has been updated, in seconds.

fields.name: expiry
docs: Unix timestamp of when the pool expires, in seconds.

fields.name: amount
docs: The amount of currency held in the pool

fields.name: takerSellCount
docs: How many times a taker has SOLD into the pool

fields.name: takerBuyCount
docs: How many times a taker has BOUGHT from the pool

fields.name: sharedEscrow
docs: If an escrow account is present, means it's a shared-escrow pool

fields.name: cosigner
docs: Offchain actor signs off to make sure an offchain condition is met (eg trait present)

fields.name: maxTakerSellCount
docs: Limit how many buys a pool can execute - useful for shared escrow pools, else keeps buying into infinitya

accounts.name: FeeVault
docs: Sharded fee accounts
Seeds: "fee_vault", number, bump
There are up to 256 fee accounts, and the number in the seed
is found by getting the last byte of mint pubkey.

fields.name: mmCompoundFees
docs: Trade pools only

fields.name: seeds
docs: The vector of derivation seeds.

fields.name: proof
docs: The merkle proof.

errors.name: InvalidProof
errors.msg: invalid merkle proof, token not whitelisted

errors.name: WhitelistNotVerified
errors.msg: whitelist not verified -- currently only verified pools supported

errors.name: BadWhitelist
errors.msg: unexpected whitelist address

errors.name: WrongPoolType
errors.msg: operation not permitted on this pool type

errors.name: BadFeeAccount
errors.msg: fee account doesn't match that stored on pool

errors.name: BadEscrowAccount
errors.msg: escrow account doesn't match that stored on pool

errors.name: MissingFees
errors.msg: when setting up a Trade pool, must provide fee bps & fee vault

errors.name: FeesTooHigh
errors.msg: fees entered above allowed threshold

errors.name: DeltaTooLarge
errors.msg: delta too large

errors.name: ArithmeticError
errors.msg: arithmetic error

errors.name: WrongPool
errors.msg: this nft doesnt belong to this pool

errors.name: RoyaltiesEnabled
errors.msg: royalties are enabled always

errors.name: PriceMismatch
errors.msg: specified price not within current price

errors.name: ExistingNfts
errors.msg: cannot close pool with nfts in escrow -- withdraw all before closing

errors.name: WrongMint
errors.msg: wrong mint passed for provided accounts

errors.name: InsufficientTswapAccBalance
errors.msg: insufficient Tswap account balance

errors.name: BadOwner
errors.msg: bad owner

errors.name: FeesNotAllowed
errors.msg: fees not allowed for non-trade pools

errors.name: BadMetadata
errors.msg: metadata account does not match

errors.name: CreatorMismatch
errors.msg: provided creator address does not match metadata creator

errors.name: WrongPoolVersion
errors.msg: wrong pool version provided

errors.name: PoolsAreTheSame
errors.msg: new pool should not match old pool

errors.name: WrongAuthority
errors.msg: wrong nft authority account provided

errors.name: FrozenAmountMismatch
errors.msg: amount frozen doesnt match current price

errors.name: BadMintProof
errors.msg: mint proof account does not match

errors.name: BadCosigner
errors.msg: bad cosigner passed - either wrong key or no signature

errors.name: PoolFrozen
errors.msg: pool is frozen and cannot execute normal operations

errors.name: BadSharedEscrow
errors.msg: bad shared escrow account passed

errors.name: PoolNotOnSharedEscrow
errors.msg: expected a shared escrow pool to be passed in

errors.name: PoolOnSharedEscrow
errors.msg: expected a non-shared escrow pool to be passed in

errors.name: WrongOrderType
errors.msg: wrong order type

errors.name: WrongFrozenStatus
errors.msg: wrong frozen status

errors.name: SharedEscrowInUse
errors.msg: shared escrow account has pools open and is in use

errors.name: MaxTakerSellCountExceeded
errors.msg: max taker sell count exceeded, pool cannot buy anymore NFTs

errors.name: MaxTakerSellCountTooSmall
errors.msg: max taker sell count is too small

errors.name: BadRuleSet
errors.msg: rule set for programmable nft does not match

errors.name: PoolFeesCompounded
errors.msg: this pool compounds fees and they cannot be withdrawn separately

errors.name: BadRoyaltiesPct
errors.msg: royalties percentage passed in must be between 0 and 100

errors.name: StartingPriceTooSmall
errors.msg: starting price can't be smaller than 1 lamport

errors.name: PoolKeepAlive
errors.msg: Pool must keep minimum rent balance

errors.name: WrongRentPayer
errors.msg: Wrong rent payer

errors.name: SplTokensNotSupported
errors.msg: SPL tokens not supported

errors.name: ExpiryTooLarge
errors.msg: Expiry too large

errors.name: ExpiredPool
errors.msg: Expired Pool

errors.name: PoolNotExpired
errors.msg: Pool not expired

errors.name: InvalidFeeCrank
errors.msg: Invalid fee crank
